metadata.name: Created Files by Microsoft Sync Center
metadata.comment: This rule detects suspicious files created by Microsoft Sync Center (mobsync)

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\mobsync.exe')) AND (endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.dll')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.exe'))))

output.summary: This rule detects suspicious files created by Microsoft Sync Center (mobsync)
